professionalSummary: Dedicated and versatile Software Developer with extensive experience in frontend development delivering high-quality software solutions and leading cross-functional engineering teams. Proficient in React, Next.js, Vue, TypeScript, and various web technologies. Proven track record of delivering high-impact FinTech solutions, real-time applications, and AI-powered features. Strong advocate for engineering excellence, accessibility standards, and collaborative development practices. Known for quick learning, adaptability, and strong communication skills, combined with a passion for continuous self-development and team collaboration.

other: Visual Development Tools for Rapid Prototyping/Development (FlutterFlow)

professionalExperience.title: Frontend Developer & Team lead
responsibilities: Led cross‑functional teams (UI/UX, marketing, backend, frontend) to architect, ship, and iterate on SafulPay FinTech infrastructure and core systems.

Collaboratively Shipped SafulPay v2: FlutterFlow (Flutter) front end with Go backend; collaborated on customer and agent portals, agency monitoring platform, and merchant bulk payment/collections web app.

Rebuilt company website using React + TypeScript, achieving ~40% performance improvement through code optimization, lazy loading, and GSAP animations; converted Figma designs to pixel-perfect, accessible UI.
Created product tutorials and documentation; maintained API/technical notes for smooth collaboration.
Established engineering standards: enforced Git/GitHub best practices (structured PRs, semantic commits), accessibility compliance, and performance benchmarks.
Created comprehensive technical documentation, API guides, and product tutorials to streamline team collaboration and onboarding

professionalExperience.title: Frontend & Software Developer
responsibilities: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop and maintain web applications, including an e-commerce site using Laravel and Safulpay v1; front end in FlutterFlow backend in PHP.
Demonstrated the ability to quickly master software tools for software development, writing, animation, and graphic design, creating engaging content tailored to client needs.

professionalExperience.title: Frontend Engineer Intern
responsibilities: Collaborated in fast-paced, production environment with backend/frontend engineers, PMs, designers, and QA teams to ship features under tight deadlines.

Co-developed "Resolve" voting platform using Next.js + TypeScript: implemented secure election infrastructure for organizations and individuals; built responsive UI with Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui component library.
Built a text‑processing AI application in React + TypeScript using Chrome Origin Trials APIs (Language Detector, Summarization, Translation) for real-time language detection and translation.
Maintained engineering excellence: delivered accessible, responsive UI optimized performance metrics; conducted code reviews and collaborated on cross-functional feature development.

professionalExperience.title: Interim Developer
responsibilities: Intensive, education‑driven internship focused on technical, soft skills and frontend engineering fundamentals.
Built production -ready projects including "ScissorsWeb" (URL Shortener with analytics) and "Task Pilot" (task management app) consuming RESTful APIs and implementaing authentication.
Practiced Git/Github workflows, wrote comprehensive unit tests to ensure code quality and functionality.

professionalExperience.title: IT Specialist
responsibilities: Oversaw day-to-day technical operations, ensuring uptime and rapid bug resolution.
Automated customer data collation and contact workflows for efficient records management.
Executed digital marketing campaigns (email/SMS) and collected feedback for iteration.

education.institution: Federal University of Agriculture, Abeokuta, Nigeria

projects.name: Signalist (AI Real-Time Stock Market Dashboard)
description: A comprehensive stock market application featuring real-time price updates, advanced search functionality, and personalized stock alerts.
Implemenied interactive charts for data visualization, AI-powered market insights, and automated daily news summaries.
Architect user features including customizable watchlists and portfolio tracking.

projects.name: Safulpay Ecosystem (FinTech)
description: SafulPay mobile application for agents, users and marchants to provide seamless and secure mobile money solutuons; frontend - FlutterFlow (Flutter), backend v1 (PHP), v2 (Go).
Agency monitoring web app for real time agency performance tracking and management (React TS + Laravel).
Merchant web app for bulk payments and collections. (Laravel), integrated REST endpoint.
Rebuilt SafulPay website in React + TypeScript, Tailwind CSS and GSAP for animation to improve overall load time/performance by ~40% and translate Figma to production UI.

projects.name: Resolve (Voting Web App)
description: A Secure voting platform for individuals and organizations. It features a responsive and accessible user interface, integrated REST endpoints and was developed following structured PR/commits and performance best pratices

projects.name: Chat With Isime (Text Processing AI Bot)
description: A text processing AI bot that leverages Chrome Origin Trials APIs (Detector, Summarization, Translation) for automatic language detection and on‑the‑fly text translations.

projects.name: TaskPilot (Task Management App)
description: A task management application built with Vue 3's composition API. It serves to demonstrates framework versatility and component-based architecture.
